subject: Television
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Van Gundy had a job as an analyst and he only partly did it. He analyzed plays well and showed his off-kilter sense of humor, but did not analyze Stan Van Gundy the coach at all.
snippet: Jeff Van Gundy had a job as an analyst and he only partly did it. He analyzed plays well and showed his off-kilter sense of humor, but did not analyze Stan Van Gundy the coach at all.
